StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetInPoolDetailByOrgFy]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int , @FiscalYear int
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @FY_BEGIN_DATE DATETIME, @END_DATE DATETIME, @CURRENT_DATE date.me; SET @CURRENT_DATE = GetDate();
DECLARE @Current_Month DATETIME; SET @Current_Month = CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), Year(@CURRENT_DATE)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), Month(@CURRENT_DATE)) + '-1' as Date.me);
DECLARE @CurrentFiscalYear int SET @CurrentFiscalYear = YEAR(@CURRENT_DATE)
IF MONTH(@CURRENT_DATE) = 10 OR MONTH(@CURRENT_DATE) = 11 OR MONTH(@CURRENT_DATE) = 12 BEGIN SET @CurrentFiscalYear = @CurrentFiscalYear + 1 END
SET @FY_BEGIN_DATE = CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear-1) + '-10-1' as Date.me); IF @CurrentFiscalYear = @FiscalYear BEGIN SET @END_DATE = DATEADD(month, 1, @Current_Month); END ELSE BEGIN SET @END_DATE = CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear) + '-10-1' as Date.me); END
SELECT DISTINCT p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, p.MIDDLE_NAME AS LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.CONTRACT_ID, p.DEP_DATE AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, p.COMPONENT_CODE, p.GENDER_CODE, ( SELECT DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = cs.STATUS_TYPE AND STATUS_CODE = cs.STATUS_CODE AND DISPOSITION_CODE = cs.DISPOSITION_CODE ) AS Disposi.on, p.PADD_DATE AS PADD, n.rowguid AS NwaId, (SELECT ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = n.rowguid) AS ProspectId FROM [MCRISS_OLAP].[dbo].POOLEES_DATASHEET p INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract ct ON ct.CONTRACT_ID = p.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.NWA_ID = ct.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs2 WHERE cs2.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID) WHERE convert(date.me, convert(varchar(4),p.PADD_YEAR)+'-'+convert(varchar(2),p.PADD_MONTH)+'-' + convert(varchar(2),'1')) >= @FY_BEGIN_DATE AND convert(date.me, convert(varchar(4),p.PADD_YEAR)+'-'+convert(varchar(2),p.PADD_MONTH)+'-' + convert(varchar(2),'1')) < @END_DATE AND p.RPT_MONTH = p.PADD_MONTH AND p.RPT_YEAR = p.PADD_YEAR AND p.RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID
UNION
-- shippers that were in pool that month will not be part of the poolee data, therefore will need to be added - ERR SELECT DISTINCT s.LAST_NAME, s.FIRST_NAME, s.MIDDLE_NAME AS LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, c.CONTRACT_ID, ct.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, s.COMPONENT_CODE, s.GENDER_CODE, ( SELECT DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = cs.STATUS_TYPE AND STATUS_CODE = cs.STATUS_CODE AND DISPOSITION_CODE = cs.DISPOSITION_CODE ) AS Disposi.on, c.PADD_DATE AS PADD, n.rowguid AS NwaId, (SELECT ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = n.rowguid) AS ProspectId FROM [MCRISS_OLAP].[dbo].SHIPPERS s INNER JOIN MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.Contracts c ON (c.PERSON_ID = s.PERSON_ID AND c.CONTRACT_ID IN (SELECT MAX(c2.CONTRACT_ID) FROM MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.Contracts c2 WHERE c2.PERSON_ID = c.PERSON_ID ) ) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract ct ON ct.CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.NWA_ID = ct.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs2 WHERE cs2.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID) WHERE s.SHIP_DATE >= @FY_BEGIN_DATE AND s.SHIP_DATE < @END_DATE AND s.RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID
UNION
-- dep discharges that were in pool that month will not be part of the poolee data, therefore will need to be added - ERR SELECT DISTINCT c.LAST_NAME, c.FIRST_NAME, c.MIDDLE_NAME AS LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, c.CONTRACT_ID, ct.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, c.COMPONENT_CODE, c.GENDER_CODE, ( SELECT DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = cs.STATUS_TYPE AND STATUS_CODE = cs.STATUS_CODE AND DISPOSITION_CODE = cs.DISPOSITION_CODE ) AS Disposi.on, c.PADD_DATE AS PADD, n.rowguid AS NwaId, (SELECT ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = n.rowguid) AS ProspectId FROM [MCRISS_OLAP].[dbo].CONTRACTS c INNER JOIN MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.CONTRACT_DISCHARGES cd ON c.CONTRACT_ID = cd.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract ct ON ct.CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.NWA_ID = ct.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs2 WHERE cs2.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID) WHERE c.RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID AND c.PADD_DATE >= @FY_BEGIN_DATE AND c.PADD_DATE < @END_DATE AND c.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO','K4','K8','K9','B5','11')
ORDER BY LAST_NAME
END
